attributes.richTextValue: CUSTOMER SUCCESS

Helping you get the most value out of your

insightsoftware solutions
Customer Success Manager

A designated CSM can be your regular point

of contact, and help you with resources and

product lifecycle.
Customer Portal

Join our very own customer community and

find the best practices and solutions.

Discover, learn, and help.
Product Support

Our product specialists create a smooth start

with rapid deployment and help you maintain

﻿endurance.
Billing & Renewable

Whether you want to renew your subscription

or have questions about your invoice, talk to

us about how we can support you.
User Groups

Join other customers in a group setting

facilitated by ISW team members to

collaborate about ISW products.
Innovation Portal

Influence the product roadmap by sharing

ideas and voting on suggestions from other

﻿customers, partners and employees.

Not sure who to go to for help? That's okay, we are here to help.

Email: customersuccess@insightsoftware.com
EXPANDING YOUR KNOWLEDGE

Our sole mission is to stay abreast of technology,

﻿know-how, and industry best practices.

insightsoftware is constantly anticipating immediate and future needs of our customers and partners. We offer high quality, cost-effective training that

emphasizes practical methods for using our software. We offer a variety of training options for individuals or small groups.
Instructor Led Training

Conducted by an insightsoftware certified instructor in an interactive,

virtual environment, each session provides hands-on practical skills in a

lab setting. It is an affordable, flexible solution for companies and

individuals interested in learning how to fully capitalize on our products to

﻿ improve operations and simplify their day-to-day tasks.
Self - Service Training

Our state-of-the-art training portal provides users with the opportunity to

explore, expand, and strengthen their insightsoftware product skills at their

own pace. Participants will follow learning paths based on the topic of their

choice, with frequent knowledge checks along the way to ensure

comprehension.
Webinars & Resources

Take a look at our upcoming and on-demand webinars packed with handy tips, best practices, and insights, brought to you by insightsoftware's product and

﻿solutions experts.
